answers.answer: Its wont make u failed but its wont showing your real result
Even if I just ate a very small amount ?
Allow an hr at least before going in. Too close and yes you could fail falsely from it. They give you an insane amount of sugar.

Well I had cereal around 7:40 they won't see me until 8:30ish I hope that's enough time and I just felt like I was going to throw up if I didnt eat so I quickly ate a little cereal before leaving the house ugh I hope I don't fail I'm already stressed enough having high blood pressure sometimes

You should definitely be fine, I ate a mcgriddle from mcdonalds with a hash brown & orange juice before mine because I wasn't told not to eat and I passed just fine. I don't think mine was even an hour before and that has lots of sugar
U can eat before the test but nothing that got sugar inside
